{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Fon Wireless |model=FON2412 |revision=BPO |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/02/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UVAFON2412 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} May simply be known as the FON2412 or FON2412B.
The FCC sample label shows a sample MAC beginning with 00:40:F4 :to the right of the sample label. This is a CAMEO OUI.
'''Macronix''' MX25L????EM2I-12G
